description: This file contains adapter functions that bridge Kotlin coroutines Flow types (StateFlow and SharedFlow) to Android's LiveData, facilitating integration between coroutine-based streams and the Android UI components.

methods.name: toLiveData
methods.description: Converts a StateFlow of GameSnapshot to LiveData, optionally specifying a coroutine scope. Uses Dispatchers.Main.immediate for thread context if scope is provided.

methods.name: toLiveData
methods.description: Converts a SharedFlow of any type to LiveData, suitable for one-shot events, using Dispatchers.Main.immediate for thread context.
